# Matching

## Darkmode

```{webr-r}
library(tidyverse)
# darkmode einlesen
darkmode <- read_csv("datasets/darkmode.csv")
glimpse(darkmode)

# Alle Variablen zu typ 'numeric' formatieren
darkmode <- darkmode %>% 
  mutate_all(.funs = as.numeric)
```
